background: The problem is to find the minimum number of employees needed to meet a certain coverage requirement where employees work for a set number of consecutive days followed by a mandatory rest period.
constraints: Each employee works for WorkingDays consecutive days
Each employee must have at least RestingDays consecutive days of rest
Number of employees is a non-negative integer
objective: Minimize the number of employees to hire to meet the coverage requirements
description: Calculate the minimum number of employees to hire such that the requirements for coverage (as described by \param{Num}) can be met with each employee working for \param{WorkingDays} consecutive days followed by at least \param{RestingDays} consecutive resting days.

parameters.definition: The number of users on the nth day
Number of consecutive working days before a resting period
